description: Saaya Yamabuki is an egotistical girl in the same class as Amu and leader of the Tadase Fan Club. Along with the other club members, Saaya shows off whenever she gets the chance in order to impress Tadase, Kukai, or any other handsome boys who happen to show up, but to no avail. She is portrayed as being very coldhearted, nasty, and unable to sing.
name: Yamabuki Saaya
